abstract: Pabst Brewing, the maker of Pabst Blue Ribbon and Schlitz, is in the final stages of a deal to sell itself to food investor C. Dean Metropoulos for about $250 million, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Pabst Brewing, the maker of Pabst Blue Ribbon and Schlitz, is in the final stages of a deal to sell itself to food investor C. Dean Metropoulos for about $250 million, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Pabst Brewing, the maker of Pabst Blue Ribbon and Schlitz, is in the final stages of a deal to sell itself to food investor C. Dean Metropoulos for about $250 million, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing sources familiar with the matter.

headline.main: Deal Brewing for Pabst, Report Says
